scheme_name: Scheme for Grant of Additional Scholarship to the Students Belonging to Scheduled Tribes of Andaman and Nicobar Islands for Pursuing Higher Studies Anywhere in India Post-Senior Secondary Courses (Post 10+2 Courses)
description: This scheme provides additional scholarships to Scheduled Tribe (ST) students from Andaman and Nicobar Islands pursuing higher education (post 10+2) anywhere in India. The scheme aims to support ST students in accessing quality higher education opportunities.
key_features: Covers post 10+2 courses anywhere in India
Implemented by the Andaman and Nicobar Administration

benefits.scholarship_amount: Varies based on course and institution
benefits.coverage: Tuition fees, maintenance allowance, and other expenses

education_criteria: Students enrolled in post 10+2 courses (degree, diploma, postgraduate)
Courses must be recognized by UGC, AICTE, or equivalent
additional_criteria: Applicant must belong to Scheduled Tribes (ST) of Andaman and Nicobar Islands
Must be a resident of Andaman and Nicobar Islands
eligibility.admission_requirement: Admission to recognized institutions through merit or entrance tests

eligible_courses_delhi: Graduate and postgraduate courses in arts, science, commerce, engineering, medical, etc.
Professional courses like B.Tech, MBBS, MBA, etc.
Diploma courses approved by regulatory bodies

steps: Obtain application form from the Tribal Welfare Department, Andaman and Nicobar
application_process.note: Contact the department for application details

required_documents.note: To prove Andaman and Nicobar residency

special_notes: Scholarship is additional to other scholarships
Applicable for studies anywhere in India
